item.title: Test Post
item.description: I use this site to provide basic information about myself and document my coding experience.

item.title: Building my Blog with a Static Site Generator
item.description: It took me a few days to build this simple site. For my use case, the set up is an overkill. I end up spending most of my time tweaking the stylesheet, which is a pain to handle in static site generators. I have intended to build a proper personal site for a while and Jekyll seemed to be the most natural choice. I had little idea about what a static site generator (SSG) is going in.
